meanings.definition: In a light and carefree manner.
meanings.sent1: She skipped jauntily down the path.
meanings.sent2: The children danced jauntily at the party.
meanings.sent3: The puppy wagged its tail jauntily as it chased its own shadow.
meanings.sent4: The leaves rustled jauntily in the breeze.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons floated jauntily in the sky.

meanings.definition: With a self-assured and stylish manner.
meanings.sent1: He wore his hat jauntily to the side.
meanings.sent2: The cat strutted jauntily along the fence.
meanings.sent3: The car parked in the driveway looked jauntily polished.
meanings.sent4: The sailboat glided jauntily across the water.
meanings.sent5: Her jauntily tied scarf added a pop of color to her outfit.
